translations: 精准确定（位置或时间）；准确解释，查明

sentences.sentence: Data recorders also pinpoint mechanical faults rapidly, reducing repair times.
sentences.translation: 数据记录仪器也能很快查明机械故障，减少维修时间。

sentences.sentence: I could pinpoint his precise location on a map.
sentences.translation: 我能在地图上指出他的确切位置。

sentences.sentence: It was almost impossible to pinpoint the cause of death.
